      • findNextSegment

        protected int findNextSegment(byte[] source,
                  int position,
                  java.util.List<java.nio.ByteBuffer> segmented)
                       throws InvalidSegmentException
        Description copied from class: ByteArraySegmenter
        Finds and adds a protocol segment it finds into ByteArraySegmenter.segmented and returns the last position it reached in its search. Will return -1 if it cannot find a segment.
        Specified by:
        findNextSegment in class ByteArraySegmenter<java.nio.ByteBuffer>
        Parameters:
        source - holds the bytes we will be processing
        position - to start searching from within source
        segmented - the segmented
        Returns:
        last valid position or -1 if there is no valid segment.
        Throws:
        InvalidSegmentException - the invalid segment exception
